src:
Video: V NHL sa predlžovalo, Tatar kuriózne skóroval a pridal aj asistenciu
01 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Webnoviny
1.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Slovenský hokejista Tomáš Tatar mal veľký podiel na víťazstve Montrealu Canadiens na ľade Vegas Golden Knights 5:4 po predĺžení vo štvrtkovom zápase NHL. Tatar strelil gól, pridal aj asistenciu a jeho tím si pripísal tretie víťazstvo v sérii. Montreal sa po siedmom triumfe v sezóne posunul na tretiu priečku v Atlantickej divízii.
Kuriózny gól Tatara
Tatar opäť nastúpil v prvej útočnej formácii Canadiens a mal prsty v prvom aj treťom góle svojho tímu. Už v 3. min zápasu hostia otvorili skóre Phillipom Danaultom. Tatar predtým udržal puk v útočnom pásme, zamiešal s ním, elegantne ho pristavil na hokejku Sheu Webera a po jeho strele Danault z dorážky skóroval.
Hráči Vegas otočili vývoj a po zásahu Marka Stona zo 48. min viedli 4:2. Potom prišiel k slovu opäť Tatar, hoci jeho gól na 3:4 bol z veľkej miery aj dielom šťastia. Šesť a pol minúty pred koncom tretej tretiny hostia dohrávali presilovku a Stone v snahe odpáliť puk do bezpečia nastrelil Tatara do hrude.
Odtiaľ sa puk odrazil za chrbát brankára Vegas. Bol to štvrtý gól a jedenásty bod slovenského krídelníka v tejto sezóne NHL.
Domi pochválil brankára Kinkaida
Tatar ním naštartoval výsledkový obrat hostí. Brendan Gallagher neskôr vyrovnal na 4:4 a Max Domi po dvadsiatich šiestich sekundách predĺženia rozhodol o dvoch bodoch pre Montreal. Tatar celkovo odohral 17:14 min a pripísal si aj dva bodyčeky, jednu zablokovanú strelu a dve trestné minúty. Po zápase slovenský hráč vyzdvihol druhé víťazstvo svojho tímu u súpera v priebehu dvoch dní. V stredu Montreal uspel na ľade Arizony (4:1).
„Môžeme byť na to právom hrdí. Arizona hrala veľmi dobre a to isté platí aj o Vegas. Zaťali sme sa však a získali 4 body na tomto ´tripe´, čo je skvelé. Porozprávali sme sa, dosiahli góly a momentálne sme na dobrej ceste,“ uviedol Tomáš Tatar, cituje ho portál NHL.
„Odohrali sme veľký zápas, najmä náš brankár Keith Kinkaid chytal neuveriteľne. Dal nám šancu na víťazstvo a my sme na ňu odpovedali. Ukázali sme veľký charakter,“ podotkol Max Domi, strelec víťazného gólu Canadiens. „Je neprípustné, čo sa stalo. Oni hrali dva zápasy za sebou a my sme im v tretej tretine prenechali víťazstvo. Nestačí to, čo sme predviedli. Bolo toho málo,“ komentoval útočník Vegas Jonathan Marchessault.
„Predátori“ premárnili vedenie
Aj druhý štvrtkový zápas NHL priniesol veľký obrat a predĺženie. Nashville viedol nad Calgary po dvoch tretinách 4:1 a ešte minútu a pol pred koncom tretej tretiny 5:4, ale bral iba jeden bod.
Kanadský tím nasmeroval za víťazstvom Mattthew Tkachuk, keď skóroval 39 sekúnd pred koncom riadneho hracieho času a potom aj dve sekundy pred záverom predĺženia.
„Mal som šťastie, že to tam padlo. Vedel som, že prebiehajú posledné sekundy a že sa treba ponáhľať. Nevedel som, či vôbec stihnem vystreliť, ale podarilo sa to,“ uviedol Matthew Tkachuk podľa portálu NHL.
Výsledky – NHL
štvrtok
Vegas – Montreal 4:5 po predĺžení (2:1, 0:1, 2:2 – 0:1)* Tomáš Tatar (Montreal) odohral 17:14 min, 1 gól, 1 asistencia, 4 strely, 2 „hity“, 1 zablokovaná strela, 2 trestné minúty

Nashville – Calgary 5:6 po predĺžení (2:1, 2:0, 1:4 – 0:1)

Viac k témam: NHLZdroj: Webnoviny.sk – Video: V NHL sa predlžovalo, Tatar kuriózne skóroval a pridal aj asistenciu © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
Video: In the NHL it was prolonged, Tatar quieterly scored and added assistance
01 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Webnoviny
1.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Slovak hockey player Tomas Tatar had a big share in the Montreal Canadiens victory on the Vegas Golden Knights 5: 4 after overtime in Thursday's NHL match. Tatar scored a goal, added assistance and his team scored the third victory in the series. Montreal moved to third place in the Atlantic Division after the seventh triumph of the season.
Curious goal Tatara
Tatar started again in Canadiens's first offensive formation and had his fingers in the first and third goals of his team. Already in the 3rd minute of the match the guests opened the score with Phillip Danault. Tatar had previously kept the puck in the offensive zone, mixed it, gracefully put it on the Sheu Weber stick and scored Danault after his shot.
Vegas players reversed their development and led by Mark Stone from 48th minute leading 4: 2. Then Tatar came again, although his 3: 4 goal was largely due to luck. Six and a half minutes before the end of the third period, the guests played a power play and Stone shot Tatar in the chest in an effort to detonate the puck to safety.
From there the puck bounced behind the back of the goalkeeper Vegas. It was the fourth goal and the eleventh point of the Slovak Winger this season NHL.
Domi praised the goalkeeper Kinkaida
Tatar started the result turnover of guests. Brendan Gallagher later leveled to 4: 4 and Max Domi decided to score two points for Montreal after twenty-six seconds of overtime. Tatar played a total of 17:14 min and scored two points, one blocked shot and two penalty minutes. After the match the Slovak player picked up his team's second victory in two days. On Wednesday Montreal succeeded on Arizona ice (4: 1).
“We can be proud of it. Arizona played very well and the same goes for Vegas. However, we clenched and got 4 points on this 'tripe', which is great. We talked, scored goals and are on the right track right now, ”said Tomas Tatar, quoted by the NHL portal.
“We played a big game, especially our goalkeeper Keith Kinkaid caught incredibly. He gave us a chance of victory and we answered it. We showed a great character, ”said Max Domi, the scorer of Canadiens' winning goal. “What happened is inadmissible. They played two games in a row and we gave them the victory in the third period. It is not enough what we have shown. There was little, ”commented Vegas striker Jonathan Marchessault.
"Predators" wasted leadership
Also the second NHL Thursday game brought a big turnover and extension. Nashville led Calgary after two thirds 4: 1 and a minute and a half before the end of the third third 5: 4, but took only one point.
The Canadian team headed for Mattthew Tkachuk's victory by scoring 39 seconds before the end of regular time and then two seconds before the end of the overtime.
“I was lucky it fell there. I knew that the last seconds were going on and that we had to hurry. I didn't know if I could shoot at all, but I did, ”said Matthew Tkachuk, according to the NHL portal.
Results - NHL
Thursday
Vegas - Montreal 4: 5 after overtime (2: 1, 0: 1, 2: 2 - 0: 1) * Tomas Tatar (Montreal) played 17:14 min, 1 goal, 1 assists, 4 shots, 2 "hits" , 1 blocked missile, 2 penalty minutes

Nashville - Calgary 5: 6 overtime (2: 1, 2: 0, 1: 4 - 0: 1)
